mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(message_id, act_id, source_id, target_id, reple_id, is_read, message_type, comment_act_id) VALUES(#{messageId}, #{actId}, #{sourceId}, #{targetId}, #{replyId}, #{isRead}, #{messageType}, #{commentActId})
